TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContextMenuCallback

summary.span: Agrega elementos de menú a un menú contextual.

span.span: Adds menu items to a shortcut menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz IContextMenuCallback y Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the IContextMenuCallback interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 AddItem(valuetype Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.CONTEXTMENUITEM& pItem) cil managed
Public Function AddItem (ByRef pItem As CONTEXTMENUITEM) As Integer

param.name: pItem
param.span: Puntero a con el elemento que se va a agregar.

span.span: A pointer to a with the item to add.

summary.span: Agrega un elemento único a un menú contextual.

span.span: Adds a single item to a shortcut menu.

Docs.returns: | Valor devuelto | Descripción | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | pItem se ha agregado correctamente.| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | pItem was added successfully. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | Se ha producido un error inesperado.| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_POINTER | pItem es null (Nothing en Visual Basic).| | E\_POINTER | pItem is null (Nothing in Visual Basic). | | E\_INVALIDARG | Uno o más de los miembros contienen uno o más valores que no son válidos o que producen un error conocido.| | E\_INVALIDARG | One or more of the members contains one or more values that are not valid or the values cause a known error. |

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para obtener más información sobre la programación con la interfaz y la Microsoft Management Console (MMC), vea el [Guía del programador de MMC](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).For more information about programming with the interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
